title: Фрегат Эссекс
author: Shenderov Alexander
description:
It is a big masterpiece which will defenetely decorate and impress viewers. So many details and so real. The transparency of the shore green water makes difficult to belive that it is possible at all to pick the colors in such a perfect way. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Essex Frigate' is related to fantasy being a representative of landscapes genre. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
